website_summaries.verdict: These flexible, moisture-wicking pants are a great base layer under athletic pants or shorts and they can help prevent chafing.
pros: Dries quickly, which helps to reduce odors
Help you keep warm in cold weather
cons: Some users have said that they are too tight in the quads and have a tendency to slide down

customer_reviews.title: Nice full length leggings
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I usually wear 3/4 leggings but decided to try these. They are very comfortable. I do wish that they had a thicker waist band. I like the like 2 inch waistband that is normally on leggings and such but these have a smaller one. These are very comfortable and go well with most everything.
customer_reviews.author: Slang93

customer_reviews.title: My husband finally understands my legging obsession
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. I'm obsessed with my leggings and wear them every time we do something active or hike. So he decided to try them out for himself. The minute he finished his first run in them he was like "oh my god, I GET THE LEGGINGS OBSESSION." They suck you in, hold everything still, eliminate all chafing, and are comfy as hell. He wears them under his shorts whenever he works out, runs, or goes hiking. And his legs look great in them (these are the important things). They've held up fantastically thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I used these pants for the first time today during a 3 mile run and was very impressed! Great quality, kept me warm in 35 degree temps and were very comfortable. They fit great and were in accordance with the sizing chart and are true compression tights. I own a couple of pair of Asics running tights and a pair of Hi-Five tights and all though I like them, they cannot come close to these. The material is nice and thick but not too restrictive. For sizing: I am 6'1 and 205lbs and a large fit me perfectly. Great quality, great deal for the price. Looking forward to more colors being available (Navy, Red, Charcoal Gray).
customer_reviews.author: KCR

customer_reviews.title: King Tide Rising
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfect for my Hombre de Agua costume. My measurements are 6' 185 lbs 34" waist 32" inseam and I bought a Large green. Definitely pick up a soft cup for protection (shock doctor aircore).
customer_reviews.author: 1Extra

customer_reviews.title: BUY NOW! Excellent product, exceptional quality!
customer_reviews.text: Given the cost and excellent reviews, I was compelled to give these a try. They did not disappoint. Wore them during a recent marathon relay and they worked out great...held me firmly throughout. I experienced no lower leg pain following the race. Quality is exceptional, especially for the price. I would highly recommend purchasing. My only suggestion would be for the company to offer a women's cut and more colors/prints...purple, magenta, turquoise, silver, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good snug fit, Cold layering though.
customer_reviews.text: Fit nicely as compression pants. The only issue I have but probably could be expected? There is NO warmth to these at all. I was actually colder in these than just bare legs. This may be a benefit for use during exercise. I wanted to use these at the end of hiking all day to help with swollen knees and legs which these should be good for but I will need to carry an additional base layer to keep a bit warm.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I really like these compression pants
customer_reviews.text: I really like these compression pants. I've had a total hip replacement and find that wearing these takes some of the discomfort from the hip surgery away, as well as helping my knee which has been painful because of my weird gate from the replacement recovery. I'm 5' 10" and around 200 pounds so I ordered a large. The legs were too long so I exchanged them for a medium and they're a perfect fit. So they do run a tad long in the leg. I wear these anytime I have to do something that will stress my hip and knee, as well as on flights or long drives to avoid DVT.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyB

customer_reviews.title: Tights for Tall Guys
customer_reviews.text: Finally a pair of compression tights ALMOST long enough for tall athletes! I’m 6’4” and about 260. Size L
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, not true compression.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as replacement for a compression stocking after vein surgery. These are very good quality, very comfortable and good fit. The do NOT deliver the same compression as a 20-30 mmHg stockings or sock, especially at he calf. Other than that, very nice product from a seller who seems to really care about the quality of the product and satisfaction of the customer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mannon

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and feels awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am 6ft -165, normally wearing 32 or 33 waist pants. These compression pants are awesome. I own 3 pair of Compressionz shorts and decided to try the pants for the winter season. They are the best! They are definitely snug but feel very comfortable. They seem to adapt to my body and basically feel like a second skin. I like these a lot and are my favorite brand. If you do not like a snug, tight fit you might want to go up a size but I think that defeats the purpose of compression. Nice quality, not too thin.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Good for snowboarding
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to get on, could use a little more room in the groin area. Oberall very comfortable and stays up around the waist. I wear these as a base layer when snowboarding. Maybe not as effective as a good pair of base layer pants, but I have found wearing compression pants during snowboarding really makes a difference. Legs were less fatigued and felt much better on the second and third days then when I did not wear them. This brand had held up well several seasons and many washes without losing it compression. I have also wore them during martial arts class to reduce muscle vibration when recovering from hamstring injuries.
customer_reviews.author: RLewis

customer_reviews.title: Zowie, I am addicted to these pants, size medium!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 64 years old, roughly 6ft 175lbs, and I have been a jogger for decades but in recent years I have suffered calf cramps that limit the distance and frequency of my runs. These pants, though, seem to have made a tremendous difference immediately. Once again I can run until I'm out of gas rather than until I pull up lame and I can do it every 3 days instead of every 5-6 days. They keep me warm and the feeling of evenly applied compression all up and down my legs and butt is very soothing as I run. That extra support has obviously done the trick 'cause I surely didn't suddenly get any younger since I bought them...
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Shokes

customer_reviews.title: Minimal compression though comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These pants are very comfortable to run in, though the compression effect is very minimal. I also got tripped up on the two size charts (Amazon lists one and the pictures show another). I followed the one from the pictures and ordered too large a size so I would recommend following the Amazon chart as you select the size. I'm a 30 waist and found that small was the right size and medium was too large. I can't vouch that these enhance performance....they simply keep my legs a bit warmer. There isn't enough compression to make any performance enhancing claims. I would not run in these in warm or hot weather....they function just as running pants.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart seems spot on
customer_reviews.text: First time owning something like this, so I dont have anything to compare these to, but these are comfortable. When I pulled them out of the package I half expected them to burst at the seams the second I tried to put them on. To my surprise, they did not. I'm 6'2" 245lbs with a 41 inch waist and the XXLs definitely compress, but I dont feel like they're trying to kill me, so there's that. I cant speak to how well they hold up to actual exercise yet, but I'll update after I wear them (definitely with shorts. Nooooo one wants to see all that) to the gym a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: These are great and they've held up well. I put off writing a review for a couple months (as I usually do) to make sure they don't fall apart after the first use. I bought two pair that I've been using almost daily for mountain bike rides, under the usual shorts. They're great, fit perfectly and keep me warm but not sweaty. I don't know how I lived without these things for so long, didn't realize how comfortable tights are!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Light

customer_reviews.title: Work as promised
customer_reviews.text: These pants work pretty well. I received them on time and used them in a race the next morning. I didn't realize dudes are supposed to wear shorts over them, which is unfortunate as I looked like an idiot. But the pants themselves worked great, even if my color coordination did not. I wish there were more/different pockets. I did see the pocket for cards in front, but when I put the cards in, they jabbed into my stomach even when they were covered by the flaps. And I would have liked somewhere to put my keys and phone. In any event, they worked well and I'll keep using them.
customer_reviews.author: J. McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Delivered fast -- very confortable for running.
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered very fast. They fit really well and feel very confortable while running. I am between medium and large size and decided to go with medium and had no problem fitting them when they arrived. I am 180 lbs, 5'10 about 34" waist.
customer_reviews.author: Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: 6' 2" 219lb can fit a medium pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6 2, 219 athletic build and bought the mediums. It fits really well and not too long either. I do wish it was more breathable. I am in Florida and it is warm all year round so moisture wicking and cooling is very important. Things to improve 1. More compression on the thighs/calves. 2. Definitely make a hot/cold version so people can get what's best for where they live. I don't feel any breeze pass through these honestly. 3. More colours( white camo, blue camo and desert camo) 4. make a 3/4 version
customer_reviews.author: Rj

customer_reviews.title: Work great. I have recently noted that my ankles get ...
customer_reviews.text: I suspect the problem with the fit is me and not the pants. Just a bit small in the waist, or im a bit large😀. Work great. I have recently noted that my ankles get very tight while running and dont want to flex. I wasnt sure what was causing this, but had assumed my shoes were tied too tight. Tried loosening them but no luck. Only when i realized that the problem occurred only when i wasnt wearing my compression pants did i realize how much these were helping. Im trying to get back in shape, and these are probably going to be an easential part of the program.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color sent
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of these. I returned one because the wrong color was sent. Only to find out that all of the blacks are not black at all. They are navy blue. The color? I hate. I do not like the color blue. I mostly wear black so I wanted black compression pants. Especially since it says "Black" on the description. On the other hand, the material is amazing. These aren't any cheap compression pants. Just get the color right and everything will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Deez Nizzles

customer_reviews.title: Good length and compression
customer_reviews.text: At 6'2" and 170, I was delighted that these pants cover my legs all the way down to just above my ankle. Compression is on point, as well. For someone with meatier gams, I might recommend ordering a size up. Material seems thick enough that it will not become transparent when stretched, but probably not thick enough to be considered thermal. Bought the same in black and navy, as well. Black and green have a very smooth feel to them; navy had a bit of a rubbery finish. We will see if this changes after washing. Green have already survived their first laundry load unscathed. Overall very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, feels good
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these compression pants under my karate gi pants. They serve as a rash guard, but they keep my legs warmer and I don't seem to be quite as sore, quite as long after wearing them, vs not using them. I was a bit leery at first, because they looked a lot like the yoga pants / tight leggings my wife wears - but I got over that pretty quick after my first actual class wearing them. I'll probably be picking up a top to match soon. I'd buy these again, and probably will order another set soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Great compression pants
customer_reviews.text: I bought green in large following the sizing guide. Great compression, not see-through like many others on amazon. The waist band doesn’t give a muffin top. Great product. Feel confident while lifting in these. I’m purchasing more colors. Ignore th review where the fit stretches them up to his ribs and complains, of course they’d look ridiculous if you do that.. I’m 5’11 210 lbs 11% bf if it helps others with sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Okay123098

customer_reviews.title: CompressionZ is an amazing company!
customer_reviews.text: Orginal rewiew: I found these pants to be too short in the waist. They felt like they were always falling down. They should also offer these in a higher waist design. Updated review: CompressionZ was in touch with me about my issues with the product. I have never dealt with a better company. They couldn't just change there product but they went above and beyond by refunded my purchase price and sending a different product to test to see if I liked. They also were in touch with me on letting me know they are working on a new product for men with a higher waist. Thank you for listening to your customers.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: No drawstring
customer_reviews.text: Leggings feel and look good, however when I’m running the material tends to bunch up behind my knees. There is no draw string in the waistband and I feel like at times while working out that I needed to keep pulling them up. My waist is 32” so I bought the medium size but my thighs tend to be a little bigger than normal so I’m thinking maybe I should have gone with the large instead. Hopefully these will stretch out a little and will provide a better fit over time. Overall I would just say these are ok and not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and breathable
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the quality and fabric, haven’t exercised in them yet but planning on it. I’m 6’0” 150lbs and a medium covers well, waist isn’t too low and legs don’t come up to high, definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S.

customer_reviews.title: A second skin!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They fit perfectly and feel like a second skin on my lower body. They keep you warm and allow you the freedom of movement to play sports in cold weather. I play a lot of tennis but avoid it in the winter because I find it unpleasant to play in cold weather. With these pants, it will bring back the fun for me of being outside in the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Dean and Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These pants are very well made and offered at a great price. Even though I read people's comments and referred to the sizing chart, my first order had to be returned for a different size. I'm 5'11" and 160 lbs. 32x32 pants size. The Large was just too long and had some wrinkles of extra fabric at various spots along the length of my legs. The Medium was a perfect fit. Every "body" is different, but this may help the next guy.
customer_reviews.author: Todd H

customer_reviews.title: just OK compression
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for. Not great compression like my SKINs A440, but as a low cost alternate pair these tights work fine. as others have noted, they offer a low rise fit and so can slide down backside easily. I wear shorts over them when in the gym so this hasn't been an issue. Good color selection. Length was fine for me. I purchased a Small and am 5'10" 147 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Ready Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent both for the compression effect, keeping dry and warm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of these pants to replace my gloriously worn out Tesla pants, which I kept wearing until, well, they fell apart on my hands while trying to put them on. The CompressionZ pants are even better, the material is much thicker without compromising its breathability. I have worm them as a base layer below freezing temperatures, and up to the high 40's°F with just "courtesy shorts" over them. I am already planning on picking up at least two more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Vera

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing overall
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use compression pants to bike to work in the colder months. These pants definitely seem of good quality but they don't stay up on my butt when biking, which is to say, quite disappointing. I tried a smaller size as well to see if maybe the size was the issue, but it made no difference. My understanding is that I have an average sized butt so I'm not sure why the pants only seem to stay up on my person when standing completely still, but here we are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not made for men
customer_reviews.text: This is a very bad running tight. I am fairly certain it isnt even made for men. It has the characteristic of womens tights where the thighs compress more than the waist, causing them to perpetually slide down after 5 minutes of running. After about 8 miles youll start getting bad chafing between the upper legs too.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable, Whether Indoor or Outdoor
customer_reviews.text: I love these compression pants ever since I purchased a few to wear on my daily, four-mile power walks. Now that the weather has turned cold here in MN, I find them perfect for comfort, whether outside or inside. In fact, once home, I often wear them the rest of the day. The fit is excellent, the material wet absorbing, and the price spot-on.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeside

customer_reviews.title: Great quality compression pants!  Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teenage son for track and he is very pleased with the fit. I was concerned about what size to order since he's 6'3" and wears a size 30 X 36 in pants. I ordered a medium which is the size recommend on the CompressionZ website sizing chart. They fit him perfectly. I expectedly them to be too short but they are not. These CompressionZ pants are great quality pants! I'm sure I'll be ordering more colors in the future. I'm extremely satisfied with the quality and fit of these pants!
customer_reviews.author: AES

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, form fitting, seems to be high quality, and great stretch!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously amazing compression pants/tights. These are my first pair. I am not a runner. I have spent my life climbing, hiking, backpacking, and doing lots of water sports, but these actually beckon me to go running! today’s first run was a dream. Super comfy, super form fitting, and while running with my dog, I was able to keep stride and she loved the exercise. 36 feels really good all of the sudden! Here’s to getting older!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and color.
customer_reviews.text: CompressionZ Men's Compression Pants are well-designed to provide an all-around snug fit to support my legs for any type exercise. They are really comfortable. I wear a dance belt under the tights, and the medium blue color allows for wearing these pants in the gym without any covering shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good material, great for working out
customer_reviews.text: These breathe well without having any issues of being see-through. I am 6'2" with a 33" waist. I first ordered the XL which had a good length, but they were a bit too tight overall and they slid down my waist. I returned for XXL and they fit a bit better (I have thick legs). I added a drawstring and now they don't slide down at all. Unfortunately like every other long compression pant out there they lack fabric in the groin, which certainly compresses me... 4 stars only because of that, otherwise they are comfortable to workout in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: These were a great surprise.. Wasn't sure what to expect for this price, but they are very comfortable, fit well, and are fairly thick. ( Not thin and cheap) I bought the white ones and will probably get another color at some point.
customer_reviews.author: D.Ayotte

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Makes a difference on long runs!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bigger guy and I've taken up distance running and it's definitely putting some strain on my calves, knees and quads. A friend recommended compression pants and after one long run I'm a believer! No pain at all after running for an hour. I live in Houston and I ran in 90 degree heat and a very humid day and I didn't feel overheated wearing these (if anything, it kept the mosquitoes away). Very comfortable and this brand is high quality. Will make sure I always have one of these on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Emig

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: This garment really helped me out. While indoor cycling some of my leg muscles would jiggle around and be painful during and after the workout. While wearing these everything stays in place and it really helps me power through. If I could afford to buy more at the moment I would!
customer_reviews.author: Foster Man

customer_reviews.title: Not transparent! Yay! Imma wear these things and act like a have a shapely posterior.
customer_reviews.text: As the season turns from summer to autumn and autumn to winter, I've been wearing these when I go to the gym. I like the feel and fit of the material and construction. IMHO, they compare well with other leggings I've owned. Namely, wrestling leggings. If I have any concern about these compression pants, it would be the lack of a fastening system, e.g., a drawstring. That said, I haven't experienced issues with the pants falling. Perhaps, by dint of past experience, I expect there to be a drawstring because similar products incorporated a drawstring. Overall, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Great Warm Weather Option
customer_reviews.text: A bit thinner than I expected, but still a quality product. I've been using these fairly often just as another layer on brisk mornings. I was hoping for thicker, so take my word for it - these aren't it if you're looking for cold weather solutions!
customer_reviews.author: Sam H

customer_reviews.title: Not good for baseball/softball
customer_reviews.text: Bought thesw pants to use for fall softball. They fit as expected and seemed to be better then wearing shorts only. Kept my legs decently warm. Giving 3 stars because they ripped first time i slid into a base. The description said for baseball so thought they would be able to hold up but sadly nope. Worn once and now they are garbage... Dont use if you plan on sliding with them....
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Best Skin Tight compression  i have tried since I got into wearing them!
customer_reviews.text: CompressionZ is my favorite compression and Rash guard product To this point! Even at skin tight they are still comfortable to me! Working in a glass factory is a very physical demanding job and is extremely HOT! I wear these under my work cloths and they wick away extreme sweat and keep my cool! Only complaint so to speak would be that they don't have enough color options and patterns. Would love to see CompressionZ add a few more colors, add a mock neck and maybe some cool designs!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Love Compression Z
customer_reviews.text: I have all their products and love them. I walk, cycle and hit the gym. They are the best, better than Under Armor. High quality compression for a very reasonable price. Try em, you can't go wrong. Please continue to expand the CompressionZ product line.
customer_reviews.author: Nice Chris 1942

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a Super Hero with these Tight things on
customer_reviews.text: Well by golly.. what I learned was when you want to go compression.. don't get a distressing... I'm not messin with you... buy these pants! The secret is in the Nylon.. instead of the other cheaper kind... The nylon is what cusps your tender parts together.. and keeps the shock of gravity and running your meat from hurting. Good stuff bro
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bagadonuts

customer_reviews.title: Wearing these when biking will save your legs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I bike a lot in the winter to commute, and if you've ever tried biking with dress pants on - you'll know the pain of having your legs feel like they're freezing off. Wearing these gave me good thermal insulation and I can definitely see them getting rid of any leg burn/rashes from rubbing your bare legs together in loose pants.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Relief from varicose veins
customer_reviews.text: My husband has terrible varicose veins. We bought 5 pair of these to help his circulation and alleviate the pain caused by them. He still has to spend a lot of time on his feet for work. He wears them every day under his jeans and I just bought 5 pair of the shorts for summer because he says they do keep him warm. He is 6' tall with 34"- 35" waist 34" inseam. The large fit him comfortably. He says he does have to pull them up once or twice during the day. I told him so do women with panty hose, I don't think you can get away from that.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Storms

customer_reviews.title: just ok compression, single layer fabric.
customer_reviews.text: sizing- 5'10 170, just ok compression, single layer fabric. decent but they don't wick well under several layers and hold perspiration.. I think they'd be better for warmer climes were the moisture retention would be a boon in keeping cool. i'll try them again this spring and follow up. :D
customer_reviews.author: monad

customer_reviews.title: You may want to size up
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6-1 / 179 and wear 33-34 Levi's and the large was a bit on the small side for me. The overall length was good but the waist not really high enough considering your probably going to wear these when exercising and so not likely to stay in place. Stretchy and fairly light weight.
customer_reviews.author: CraigF

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, compresses well, but the fit and temperature control...
customer_reviews.text: I overall really like these pants. I primarily use them while weightlifting (particularly leg day); the level of compression they offer is quite helpful particularly when approaching heavy lifts. However, two gripes: 1.) They seem to offer little to no warmth benefit when used outdoors in cold weather. 2.) The fit of the tights at the very top appears to be off a bit. Namely, it seems like the inseam is too long compared to the outseam, and as a result, these sit way lower on my waist than I'd like. I'm still able to get by as I always wear something on top of these, but may be worth noting, especially for those with larger posteriors.
customer_reviews.author: Prashant Jayaraman

customer_reviews.title: Love how these fit!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought many pairs of running tights and I mean a lot! I’m a trail runner so I wear running tights religiously all year around. These by far are the absolute best. The compression, fit and feel. I’ve ordered more since then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tighten up
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Nice blend of nylon and spandex. This is my second pair. They are very comfortable and supportive. I am a 34 waist and I had to go with the large size. I tried a medium with the shorts but the waist was too small, so I went with the large.
customer_reviews.author: Fredstench

customer_reviews.title: Don't order a light colored pair!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'3" tall and 175lbs, I ordered a Large, and it fits well. I run daily, and right now the weather is cold... These pants are comfortable in temperatures as low as 50F, but they won't keep you warm if it's 60F and very windy outside (10mph wind). I strongly discourage any man from choosing a lightly colored pair of these: I ordered the gray color, and they make me look super lame. Order a darker color, like Blue or Maroon - otherwise you'll look like a complete tool while wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bergfield

customer_reviews.title: Kind of compression. But not really.
customer_reviews.text: They advertise these as compression tights yet they don't tell you the compression rating. I got a size smaller than recommended and am wearing 2 at the same time and they ALMOST offer the same compression as my 2XUs. If you're a serious athlete, save the money and don't skimp on quality, your body will thank you. Given, they are slightly tighter than normal leggings. I might rate them at a 9mmHG.
customer_reviews.author: PerfectSky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and compression
customer_reviews.text: These are a great product. They provide good compression and they are comfortable as well. They seem like they should hold up well. They are a better quality than a lot of the other brands on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Daryle K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’1” 180lbs and wear size 32 34 jeans. I got the large size and they’re a perfect fit, love how they hold everything nice and tight. Remember when you were a kid and you swore your brand new shoes made you run faster? Well, these are just like that. They make you feel like super hero. No wonder Batman and Superman wear spandex :-)
customer_reviews.author: Sam Walker

customer_reviews.title: Compression z
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6”4 205lbs and athletic built and a 7 day a week gym rat. Was hesitant to order these since it was not a major brand like Nike or under armor however I took a chance and not only was it half the price it also had great compression, comfortable and would definitely order more in different colors You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: This is the first time that I try one of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I try one of these items. Since I'm allergic to so many things, I was reluctant at first. I have been using the Compression Pants for a week and I'm amused. It keeps me warm (it's quite cold in Santiago at 6 am), it doesn't itch and I often forget I'm even using it. Now I have to wash it and see how many times it will keep its shape and compression skills. So far, I'm thinking about getting a new one to wear under my suit. * This is the same review as for the Compression shirt Long sleeve. Both deserve the same treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Guajardo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! Allows me to work out harder
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my leg workouts and running. The compression is not too much or too little. Some compression pants don't compress enough. This one is just right. I am 5'10", 170lb and got a size Medium.
customer_reviews.author: Fit in L.A.

customer_reviews.title: More Colors!
customer_reviews.text: These are truly the best compression gear out on the market today, imho. I just wish they had MORE colors to choose from. Then I could wear different colors and not feel as if I am wearing the same three colors over and over (I have multiples of the same color, lol).
customer_reviews.author: Derek Stringfellow

customer_reviews.title: Great men's tights. -- SamCT
customer_reviews.text: Best thing about these compressionz men's compression tights is they are nylon and spandex blend. They are very good compression tights and at a good price. Got the white, shown here, the gray, and the blue. Am waiting for the green in my size. Thanks, Compressionz. --SamCT
customer_reviews.author: SamCT

customer_reviews.title: Great compression pants
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to workout and jog... comfortable, perfect compression (not too tight, not too loose)... The design fits perfect to the men's body keeping the boys in their place while you run/workout... the fabric allows to breath and it is soft. One thing I personally loved was that they are low cut waist... and the price is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: jlinaresmx

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but run long in the leg
customer_reviews.text: Like all others I've tried, these are good quality, but run long in the leg. If you are like me and around 5' 6 1/2" tall, you will have to fold them up some at the ankles. If I get size any smaller, they would be absolutely too tight in the waist. These almost are too tight now. Wish someone made these with shorter legs!
customer_reviews.author: JDB

customer_reviews.title: Not for big thigh guys
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. If you are a guy with larger thighs and a larger gluteus maximus, look elsewhere. These were constantly slipping down my back side, and unfortunately did not have the compressive quality I was looking for. Wish I could return them, but I’ve already worn them. Had high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: NCC

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy enough
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement for running tights from Nike which are getting old. These are fine for wearing under my workout shorts but I would feel pretty exposed wearing just these to work out in. They’re good quality but not really what I was after.
customer_reviews.author: big

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to rough play.
customer_reviews.text: Living in a colder climate, I have a teenage son who is a very active and aggressive defensive soccer player. He can get pretty beat up on the back line. Some of the lighter weight, cheaper compression pants will tear in one use. Compression Z has held up nicely. They are warm and of good quality. And I don’t have to spend ridiculous prices to get the quality of something like UA.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Neuenschwander

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, affordable, and overall excellent running pants
customer_reviews.text: I recently participated in the spartan sprint race and I felt like I had more agility with these pants. They are very tight fitting to the body but also incredibly breathable material so i still stay really cool. I've also been having a nagging issue with my knee and shin before the race, but because these pants compress the muscles yet still give me full mobility, I had little to no pain in my leg while running. They are also perfect for races that include water because they dry very quickly. Perfect for triathlons and/or obstacle races or even just for straight running. Overall I would highly recommend getting these pants for anyone with a highly active lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Nklimetz

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Feels like good quality material.
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! I wear a 34 30 in jeans and ordered a large. They fit just right around the waist. The length is funny though. Holding them at my waist they seem a little too short. Once I put them on they are slightly too long. Nothing I can’t deal with. If they are stretched too far they are very faintly see through. Nothing I am concerned with though. Also the packaging is very appealing.
customer_reviews.author: hacksaw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fit, Compression, and Value
customer_reviews.text: I use these while weightlifting (deadlift, squat) and the compression does an excellent job keeping everything exactly where it needs to be. I've never found the seams to cause irritation so they must be strategically placed. The Medium is a near perfect fit for me (5'10" / 34" waist [measured; not pant size]) and the material holds up to some abuse (they've resisted tearing against the center knurl of my cheap bar). Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Compression level may vary dependent on length of legs.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fit me, but that's probably just me. The legs are too long for me, so when worn properly, it doesn't provide much compression. I am 5'5" with 29" inseam. I need to pull the legs up 4 inches to provide needed compression; I have a 2-inch bunched overlap at the top of the thighs.
customer_reviews.author: NytWolf

customer_reviews.title: Okay for soccer but not great
customer_reviews.text: We had a soccer tournament with games at 8am on a cold morning. I thought these Compression Pants would work well to keep my muscles from cramping. They were just okay, not terrible but not great either. I think I will try a different type of base layer next time we have a cold weather game.
customer_reviews.author: momdalt6

customer_reviews.title: If you have hairy legs, the compression will actually make them colder
customer_reviews.text: I got them to provide protection for outdoor/spartan runs - they provide good wicking but in cold weather, it can actually make your legs cooler as they collapse the normal insulation from the air space from hairs on your leg.
customer_reviews.author: P. Antal

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay.
customer_reviews.text: Please be aware that these compression tights are kind of thin. On the product information page, they show a person wearing these without any clothing over it. These are a touch sheer and if you were wearing something white underneath, you will definitely be able to tell. Best worn as a base layer with shorts over. Was looking for something that could be worn by itself and would probably not purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: RLin

customer_reviews.title: These Really Compress!
customer_reviews.text: Yep, these really are compression pants. By that I mean, they Really Compress! They compress so much, they even come with directions on how to get them on. (You'd almost think they should come with a can of Pam cooking spray, but the directions work well. Think 'sliding on pantyhose' and you'll do fine.) Once they're on, though, they stay on, and I like that. There's no sagging or drooping; they just plain ol' stay on. And after all, isn't that what you want from your compression pants?
customer_reviews.author: MT Vessel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing compression gear from Compressionz since they started selling here on Amazon. I have 3 compression shorts, 3 short sleeve shirts, and now these leggings. The quality of the Compressionz gear is excellent, and is normally much less than the bigger name brands. Their customer service is absolutely excellent and they are always eager to help when needed. With what I have now, it seems that a LS shirt is in order soon!
customer_reviews.author: The Gekko  Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Obstacle Races
customer_reviews.text: Compressionz customer service is great - and their products are even better! I've used amazon for years and I hardly ever write a review but when you like a certain product you go to bat for them. I've been recommending their products to my friends. I have used their gear in 2 obstacle course races (CMC Brooklyn 14 and City Challenge Randall's Island) - and they do not disappoint. GREAT overall! I'm 6'3, 250, waist size 38 and the large size was a perfect fit! High quality fabric. I am completely satisfied. They are great with follow ups and even include a small "gift" after placing the order.
customer_reviews.author: VHR

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, I think
customer_reviews.text: At first wearing, these pants seem like an excellent buy. They fit as I expected and kept me comfortable in cold weather. However, until I've used them for six months or so, this is only a preliminary judgement. If they hold up, I'll change the overall rating to five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Baskin

customer_reviews.title: Initial thoughts - decent build quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good quality set of compression pants. I'm and idiot for ordering the wrong size but after taking a look at the quality and stretch, I ordered three more in my size. Hopefully these fare well after some wash cycles. I primarily need them for long distance cycling, so I'll update after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: gnovx

customer_reviews.title: Everything they say they are!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price these Compression Pants cost me, there is no better deal online. I search for 2-3 days before I decided to go ahead and purchase these from CompressionZ. Turns out it was a great purchase. I officiate High School basketball and softball. Work many youth tournaments on the weekends, and before if I worked 3-4 games at my age, my legs were shot. With these compression pants, I can work 4 games and come home and not be wore out. And the best of all, no fatigued legs!! Would recommend for any activity.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Golini

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Under Armour/Hello CompZ
customer_reviews.text: Received them yesterday, wearing today. Goodbye Under Armour, Hello CompressionZ. I am a girl, but ordered medium men's como leggings. Great fit, compression, thickness. Thank you, thank you that the logo is on the hip. UA has lost me as a customer as lower logo decreases versitility of wearing. The stiffer/nylon material you have is also so much better. Will work well for running and under other clothes. Have ordered another pair/color.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Great pants for gym workout
customer_reviews.text: I like this Men's CompressionZ when working out at home. I am 5'10" and 140 pounds skinny build, the M size fits very well. Good quality and comfortable wearing. When doing squat, these pants provide pretty clean feel better than loose athletic pants
customer_reviews.author: skater

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It protected my legs while doing Spartan Race by also did not bother me when sweating
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Fits and works great
customer_reviews.text: They came as claimed, fit perfectly and as I was wearing them now extensively for a long time, they have proven to be durable. As such I was ordering after a year of wearing a second pair, but unfortunately blue is out of stock. Sigh. I can only recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr 3D

customer_reviews.title: Grear but need pockets and wider waistband
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit. Wish they had pockets and wide waistbands like on women's yoga pants so they don't dig in so much. Definitely need side pockets though!
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy fit for waist size. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: These tights are unusually long for the waist size. They're so long they almost cover my toes, a problem I've never had with other tights. That's a minor nuisance, but the bigger comfort issue is that the fit on the back of the knees is sloppy resulting in bunching and chafing when my knees are bent. Since I got these for cycling, that's a rather annoying problem. I have updated this review to reflect that CompressionZ got back to me and refunded my purchase. While the product isn't good fit for me, I do appreciate them making things right.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sando

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use on flights following surgery. Comfortable beyond belief, sizing perfect, feel of the material very nice and you forget you are wearing them. Will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan West

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Under Armor
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’ tall 200 lbs. I ordered a large and they fit like compression pants should, tight but not so tight they cut off circulation. After all they are compression pants. I ordered two pair, one black and one camo, the black pair I ordered are dark blue and they fit a little more snug than the camo.
customer_reviews.author: lance Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Not the best product out here. The material is nice tho.
customer_reviews.text: The product is decently thick and tight. But the waistline is too low and continuous activity causes the tights to fall which is pretty annoying and uncomfortable. I do not like the stitching at all. The stitching starts to rupture the moment you put it on. It breaks at every stretch and I honestly don't see these lasting long. For 24 bucks, I would rather suggest investing in a better compression.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at age 77 ,I had given up on jogging due to weak knees. After reading some reviews on the compression Z. Decided I'd give them a try. I was pleasantly surprised at the support they gave to the legs and particularly to the knees. I have use them for about three weeks now and enjoying my morning jog once again.
customer_reviews.author: Isiah Morris

customer_reviews.title: They feel very much like more expensive brands I own like 2XU
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally tight but the way it should be. High quality fabric and stitching that will hopefully last enough to be worth the money. They feel very much like more expensive brands I own like 2XU. The box it came in is nice too, instead of the usual stuffed in a bag thing other sellers tend to do. And the follow up email that basically said "thank you for buying our product, we hope you enjoy it" was a noce touch.
customer_reviews.author: Cccccccccccccccc

customer_reviews.title: Not "true to size".
customer_reviews.text: I wear a mens 3xl. This is listed as "true to size" but their size chart only goes to 2xl. I took the chance on the 3xl, and nope. Does not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Darkness

customer_reviews.title: Pants fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Considering that I'm a slim, 6'3" male, I was concerned about the fit, with an inseam 34/36. They are a perfect fit! Pants are tight and and the length goes to the bottom of my ankles. Will stick with this product in the future. Now If I could only find a compression top that doesn't turn into a crop top at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Great for deadlifts
customer_reviews.text: Expected them to blow out in the first workout, but pleasantly surprised that they held up. My thighs should be too big for the biggest size, but deadlifting feels great in these pants.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Christopher

customer_reviews.title: A bit on the small side
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I like them a lot. I would say that the sizes might run a bit small. I wear Levi's 32in waist jeans (which I use as a benchmark, however right or wrong that might be) and still need a belt. I found the mediums compression pants way too tight and ordered a pair of large which fit much better. Otherwise they do exactly what they're supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: WBS

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I get women's fondness of yoga pants now. I'm 5'9" with 34" waist and ordered the large. They fit well and are correct length. Will probably order more.
customer_reviews.author: Do what feels good

customer_reviews.title: Quality true compression.
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality right out of the package. I was worried that at this price they would be thin, but they are surprisingly good. I finally went for a run with them this morning and they kept everything together and stayed in place.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the $
customer_reviews.text: My son is a punter. He asked for compression pants for Christmas. I started to purchase some that were more $$ just because of the name. Then I decided to start researching. After reading the reviews on these, I decided to give them a try. My son is impressed with the quality. He went to a kicking camp, and these helped keep his legs from getting too worn out. Thanks for the great product. Remember sometimes the name doesn't mean anything.
customer_reviews.author: Puntermom

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Comfort got a 4 star just because I’m not used to wearing tights. But honestly, putting these on made my legs feel 10 years younger & helped my game! I am 35 years old and still active with sports(basketball & football). I’ve only had them on once, but my goodness these pants can make a man feel sexy & help with performance!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Six foot and 200 pounds...the XL will not disappoint...
customer_reviews.text: These are far better than my other name-brand compression pants for constant use. Nice firm fit, no extra seams to chafe and thin for warm weather use. Amazingly well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: CompressionZ Men's Compression Pants Base Layer Running Tights Gym Leggings
feature_bullets: ATHLETIC PERFORMANCE - Our All-Purpose mens compresion pants offer firm moisture-wicking support to help muscles recover from the gym and sports such as jogging, marathons, soccer, yoga and golf.
GREAT BASE LAYER - Compression leggings are ideal spandex thermal underwear. Comfortable to wear under athletic shorts as compression running pants, men's leggings, or mens training tights.
4 WAY STRETCH FABRIC - Our compression thermal pants feature a nylon spandex blend for maximum mobility. Our workout compression pants are made with breathable fabric to keep you comfortable all day.

DESIGNED FOR ATHLETES - Our compression exercise tights are loved by athletes worldwide for rowing, weightlifting, soccer & more. Wear them as football leggings or hiking tights for blood circulation.
TRUSTED QUALITY & SATISFACTION - Our workout underwear is backed by superior quality. For a more relaxed fit, we suggest ordering one size up than what's suggested in our size chart.
